Home_Page.title: What I learned while creating this website.
Home_Page.html5: This is one of the first three things I've learned. I started a few years earlier, but now I'm serious about it.
Home_Page.css: The first thing I learned about styles was CSS, then SCSS, then SASS and finally what I like is Styled Component.
Home_Page.java_script: After Html5 and CSS, it was time to learn Javascript. Earlier, I took a classroom Java course and came to the conclusion that I am more fascinated by the Front-end.
Home_Page.react: The Javascript library that I like the most is used to create user interfaces. I will definitely learn about React Native in the future.
Home_Page.mobile_first: Mobile First is the inevitable future so it could not be missing from my website. Responsiveness is very important and I can't imagine a side without it.
Home_Page.github: A very useful platform for storing, sharing and connecting your code with others as well. A useful tool for any developer.
Home_Page.multilingual: At the moment it is a standard because our website may be interested in people from different countries.
Home_Page.udemy: Internet platform where I found courses that I liked. I am a self-taught person, so for me it is very cool where I can find courses that interest me.
Home_Page.vsc: Free code editor that I recommend. It makes writing code very easy, which makes programming fun.
Home_Page.youtube: This is the second place for me after Udemy where I find important information on how to do something. I plan to use the documentation more often in the future.
Home_Page.hooks: Hooks in React is something new that I've been learning for a month and I think it's better for me than using class components, quick, easy and fun.
Home_Page.website: On my website I used many other things like: Themne, Variables, Constant, Global Style
Home_Page.update: The website will be updated all the time, API and React Native will definitely be added. I am learning all the time, so as soon as I learn something, I will introduce it on my website.
